figures.name: Marcus Aurelius
figures.title: Roman Emperor
figures.description: Roman emperor from 161 to 180 and a Stoic philosopher. He was the last of the rulers known as the Five Good Emperors.

figures.name: Commodus
figures.title: Roman Emperor
figures.description: Roman emperor from 177 to 192. He was the son of Marcus Aurelius and is portrayed as corrupt and tyrannical in popular media.

figures.name: Lucilla
figures.title: Roman Empress
figures.description: Daughter of Marcus Aurelius and sister of Commodus. She was briefly empress as wife of Lucius Verus.

figures.name: Maximus Decimus Meridius
figures.title: Roman General
figures.description: Fictional character from the film Gladiator, but based on real historical generals and gladiators of the era.

figures.name: Gaius Julius Caesar
figures.title: Roman Dictator
figures.description: Roman general and statesman who played a critical role in the events that led to the demise of the Roman Republic and the rise of the Roman Empire.

figures.name: Cleopatra VII
figures.title: Pharaoh of Egypt
figures.description: Last active ruler of the Ptolemaic Kingdom of Egypt. She was known for her intelligence, political acumen, and romantic liaisons with Julius Caesar and Mark Antony.

figures.name: Marcus Antonius
figures.title: Roman Politician
figures.description: Roman politician and general who played a critical role in the transformation of the Roman Republic from a republic to the autocratic Roman Empire.

figures.name: Augustus
figures.title: First Roman Emperor
figures.description: Founder of the Roman Empire and its first Emperor, ruling from 27 BC until his death in AD 14.

media_works.title: Gladiator
media_works.creator: Ridley Scott
media_works.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

media_works.title: Rome
media_works.creator: John Milius
media_works.description: A down-to-earth account of the lives of both illustrious and ordinary Romans set in the last days of the Roman Republic.

media_works.title: Cleopatra
media_works.creator: Joseph L. Mankiewicz
media_works.description: Historical epic about the romance between Cleopatra and Julius Caesar, and later Mark Antony.
